SELECT seq, ordid, mid, prdname, prdbrand, ordtotalamount, ordtotalprice, ordrequest, ordstatus, ordpostnum, ordcreatedat, ordreceivername, ordreceiveraddress, ordreceiverzipcode, ordreceiverphone, prdcode, odtamount, prdprice, revcount FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as seq, ord.ordid, ord.mid, prd.prdname, prd.prdbrand, ord.ordtotalamount, ord.ordtotalprice, ord.ordrequest, ord.ordstatus, ord.ordpostnum, ord.ordcreatedat, ord.ordreceivername, ord.ordreceiveraddress, ord.ordreceiverzipcode, ord.ordreceiverphone, odt.prdcode, odt.odtamount, odt.prdprice, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review rev WHERE rev.ordid = ord.ordid AND rev.prdcode = odt.prdcode AND rev.mid = ord.mid) AS revcount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ord.ordid ORDER BY ord.ordid) as rn FROM orders ord JOIN ordersdetail odt ON ord.ordid = odt.ordid JOIN product prd ON odt.prdcode = prd.prdcode WHERE ord.mid = #{mid} ) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT seq, ordid, mid, mcreatedat, prdname, prdbrand, ordtotalamount, ordtotalprice, ordrequest, ordstatus, ordpostnum, ordcreatedat, ordreceivername, ordreceiveraddress, ordreceiverzipcode, ordreceiverphone, prdcode, odtamount, prdprice, revcount FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as seq, ord.ordid, ord.mid, mem.mcreatedat, prd.prdname, prd.prdbrand, ord.ordtotalamount, ord.ordtotalprice, ord.ordrequest, ord.ordstatus, ord.ordpostnum, ord.ordcreatedat, ord.ordreceivername, ord.ordreceiveraddress, ord.ordreceiverzipcode, ord.ordreceiverphone, odt.prdcode, odt.odtamount, odt.prdprice, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review rev WHERE rev.ordid = ord.ordid AND rev.prdcode = odt.prdcode AND rev.mid = ord.mid) AS revcount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ord.ordid ORDER BY ord.ordid) as rn FROM orders ord JOIN ordersdetail odt ON ord.ordid = odt.ordid JOIN product prd ON odt.prdcode = prd.prdcode JOIN member mem ON ord.mid = mem.mid WHERE mem.mid = #{mid} AND TRUNC(ord.ordcreatedat, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ) WHERE rn = 1
